card.title: Employee Feedback
card.desc: Build a better workplace by hearing from your employes

questions.question_text: On a scale of 1 to 5, how satisfied are you with your work-life balance?
What do you think is the company's strongest attribute?
Do you feel valued as an employee?
What changes would you suggest to improve the company culture?

card.title: Template
card.desc: Learn How employees feel with Employee engagement serveys

questions.question_text: On a scale of 1-5, how satisfied are you with your job?
Do you feel valued by your manager and colleagues?
How often do you receive clear and timely feedback on your work?
Do you have the resources and support you need to do your job effectively?
What can the company do to improve your overall job satisfaction?

card.title: Template
card.desc: set up employee review with 360 degree evaluation survey

questions.question_text: On a scale of 1-5, how would you rate this employee's job performance?
Does this employee consistently meet or exceed job expectations?
How effective is this employee at working with others on a team?
Does this employee take initiative and display a strong work ethic?
What areas does this employee need to improve in order to be more successful in their role?

card.title: Survey Builder
card.desc: use survey monkey genius to build employee surveys quickley

card.title: Success Story
card.desc: Service credit union build a covid safe workplace

card.title: Customer Satisfaction
card.desc: Build a better workplace by hearing from your employes

questions.question_text: On a scale of 1-5, how satisfied are you with the products or services you received?
Did you receive the product or service in a timely manner?
How likely are you to recommend our products or services to others?
Did our customer service meet your expectations?
What can we do to improve your overall experience with our products or services?

card.title: Customer Feedback
card.desc: Learn How Customers feel with Customers engagement serveys

questions.question_text: On a scale of 1-5, how would you rate your overall experience with our company?
Did you find what you were looking for on our website?
How likely are you to recommend our company to a friend or colleague?
What did you like most about your experience with our company?
What can we improve upon to better serve you in the future?
